mods.abstract: Performance of The Kind Of Needing I Need, written by Bill Anderson, produced by Owen Bradley, recorded on February 25, 1971 at Bradley's Barn in Mount Juliet, Tenn., and performed by Bill Anderson (vocals), Jimmy Wilson (guitar), Jerry Shook (guitar), Steve Chapman (guitar), Sonny Garrish (steel), Roy Huskey Jr. (bass), Buddy Harman (drums), Jimmy Woodard (piano), and the Jordanaires (background vocals).
